response.original_title: LiSA - LiVE is Smile Always ~PiNK & BLACK~ in Nippon Budokan "Choco Doughnut"
response.overview: This is LiSA's 3rd live video, featuring all 21 songs (planned) performed at the LiSA Live in Nippon Budokan on January 10th and 11th, 2015, on the 11th. The BD also includes bonus behind-the-scenes footage.  [Tracklist] M01 traumerei M02 oath sign M03 confidence driver M04 DOCTOR M05 永遠 M06 now and future M07 ナミダ流星群 M08 無色透明 M09 L.Miranic M10 覚醒屋 M11 crossing field M12 say my nameの片想い M13 EGOiSTiC SHOOTER M14 ROCK-mode M15 Rising Hope M16 ジェットロケット M17 シルシ [En] En01 No More Time Machine En02 Mr.Launcher En03 Crow Song En04 Believe in myself
response.title: LiSA - LiVE is Smile Always ~PiNK & BLACK~ in Nippon Budokan "Choco Doughnut"
